verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5023><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> a feast <S%G1859><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> went up <S%G305><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2414><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2414><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> the sheep <S%G4262><s%> market a pool <S%G2861><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G1951><s%> <S%G5746><s%> in the Hebrew tongue <S%G1447><s%> Bethesda <S%G964><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> porches <S%G4745><s%>.

In <S%G1722><s%> these <S%G5025><s%> lay <S%G2621><s%> <S%G5711><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> of impotent folk <S%G770><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, of blind <S%G5185><s%>, halt <S%G5560><s%>, withered <S%G3584><s%>, waiting for <S%G1551><s%> <S%G5740><s%> the moving <S%G2796><s%> of the water <S%G5204><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> went down <S%G2597><s%> <S%G5707><s%> at <S%G2596><s%> a certain season <S%G2540><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> the pool <S%G2861><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> troubled <S%G5015><s%> <S%G5707><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%>: whosoever then <S%G3767><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the troubling <S%G5016><s%> of the water <S%G5204><s%> stepped in <S%G1684><s%> <S%G5631><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5711><s%> whole <S%G5199><s%> of <S%G3739><s%> whatsoever <S%G1221><s%> disease <S%G3553><s%> he had <S%G2722><s%> <S%G5712><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G444><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>, which had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> an infirmity <S%G1722><s%> <S%G769><s%> thirty <S%G5144><s%> and eight <S%G3638><s%> years <S%G2094><s%>.

When Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> him <S%G5126><s%> lie <S%G2621><s%> <S%G5740><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5631><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he had been <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> a long <S%G4183><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> in that case, he saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Wilt thou <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5719><s%> be made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5635><s%> whole <S%G5199><s%>?

The impotent man <S%G770><s%> <S%G5723><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Sir <S%G2962><s%>, I have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, when <S%G3752><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%> is troubled <S%G5015><s%> <S%G5686><s%>, to <S%G2443><s%> put <S%G906><s%> <S%G5725><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the pool <S%G2861><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> while <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am coming <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%>, another <S%G243><s%> steppeth down <S%G2597><s%> <S%G5719><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> whole <S%G5199><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> took up <S%G142><s%> <S%G5656><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bed <S%G2895><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> walked <S%G4043><s%> <S%G5707><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the same <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%>.

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%> unto him that was cured <S%G2323><s%> <S%G5772><s%>, It is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the sabbath day <S%G4521><s%>: it is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> Torahful <S%G1832><s%> <S%G5748><s%> for thee <S%G4671><s%> to carry <S%G142><s%> <S%G5658><s%> thy bed <S%G2895><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he that was healed <S%G2390><s%> <S%G5685><s%> wist <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5715><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> had conveyed himself away <S%G1593><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, a multitude <S%G3793><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that place <S%G5117><s%>.

Afterward <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> findeth <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5719><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Behold <S%G2396><s%>, thou art made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5754><s%> whole <S%G5199><s%>: sin <S%G264><s%> <S%G5720><s%> no more <S%G3371><s%>, lest <S%G3363><s%> a worse thing <S%G5501><s%> <S%G5100><s%> come <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5638><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>.

The man <S%G444><s%> departed <S%G565><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> told <S%G312><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> had made <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5660><s%> him <S%G846><s%> whole <S%G5199><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> did <S%G1377><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> persecute <S%G1377><s%> <S%G5707><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> <S%G5707><s%> to slay <S%G615><s%> <S%G5658><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> he had done <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5707><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath day <S%G4521><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, My <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> worketh <S%G2038><s%> <S%G5736><s%> hitherto <S%G2193><s%> <S%G737><s%>, and I <S%G2504><s%> work <S%G2038><s%> <S%G5736><s%>.

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3767><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> <S%G5707><s%> the more <S%G3123><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> <S%G5658><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G3089><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> had broken <S%G3089><s%> <S%G5707><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> that 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> was his <S%G2398><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>, making <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5723><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> equal <S%G2470><s%> with 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, The Son <S%G5207><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> <S%G3756><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5721><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> of <S%G575><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, but <S%G3362><s%> what <S%G5100><s%> he seeth <S%G991><s%> <S%G5725><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5723><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> what things soever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> doeth <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5725><s%>, these <S%G5023><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> doeth <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3761><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> judgeth <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5719><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> hath committed <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5758><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> unto the Son <S%G5207><s%>:

That <S%G2443><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men should honour <S%G5091><s%> <S%G5725><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> they honour <S%G5091><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>. Verily <S%G281><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> The hour <S%G5610><s%> is coming <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> shall hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5695><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they that hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> shall live <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5695><s%>.

Marvel <S%G2296><s%> <S%G5720><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> at this <S%G5124><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> is coming <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the which <S%G3739><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that are in <S%G1722><s%> the graves <S%G3419><s%> shall hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5695><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> shall come forth <S%G1607><s%> <S%G5695><s%>; they that have done <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5660><s%> good <S%G18><s%>, unto <S%G1519><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> they that have done <S%G4238><s%> <S%G5660><s%> evil <S%G5337><s%>, unto <S%G1519><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of damnation <S%G2920><s%>.

I <S%G1473><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> of <S%G575><s%> mine own self <S%G1683><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5721><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762><s%>: as <S%G2531><s%> I hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, I judge <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5719><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> just <S%G1342><s%>; because <S%G3754><s%> I seek <S%G2212><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> mine own <S%G1699><s%> will <S%G2307><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of the Father <S%G3962><s%> which hath sent <S%G3992><s%> <S%G5660><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.

There is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> another <S%G243><s%> that beareth witness <S%G3140><s%> <S%G5723><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the witness <S%G3141><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he witnesseht <S%G3140><s%> <S%G5719><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> true <S%G227><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> man <S%G444><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> might be saved <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5686><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> greater <S%G3187><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> than that of Yochanan <S%G2491><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> finish <S%G5048><s%> <S%G5661><s%> <S%G846><s%>, the same <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, bear witness <S%G3140><s%> <S%G5719><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> hath sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G5758><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.

Ye have <S%G191><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5754><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> at any time <S%G4455><s%>, nor <S%G3777><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> <S%G5758><s%> his <S%G846><s%> shape <S%G1491><s%>.
